anya-e0801n6:1: 1. Vattamāne ti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0801n6:2_0: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti. Gacchati,
anya-e0801n6:2_1: gacchanti, gacchasi gacchatha, gacchāmi gacchāma, gacchate gacchante, gacchase gacchavhe,
anya-e0801n6:2_2: gacche gacchāmhe. Kathaṁ ‘pure adhammo dippati, purā marāmī’ti? Vattamānassevavattumiṭṭhattā
anya-e0801n6:2_3: taṁsamīpassa taggahaṇena gahaṇā, purepurāsaddehi vā anāgatattāvagame tadā tassa vattamānattā,
anya-e0801n6:2_4: kālabyattayo vā eso, bhavanteva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘santesu parigūhāmi,
anya-e0801n6:2_5: mā ca kiñca ito adaṁ’ ‘kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṁ, sahabyataṁ gacchati vāsavassa,
anya-e0801n6:3: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṁ ssāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:4_0: Bhavissati anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti. Gamissati gamissanti,
anya-e0801n6:4_1: gamissasi gamissatha, gamissāmi gamissāma, gamissate gamissante, gamissase gamissavhe,
anya-e0801n6:6_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṁ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti. Ime hi nāma
anya-e0801n6:6_1: kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti, na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā
anya-e0801n6:6_2: bhavissati, kathaṁ hi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ karissati?
anya-e0801n6:6_3: Tattha nāma tvaṁ moghapurisa mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi? Atthi
anya-e0801n6:6_4: nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṁ kummāsaṁ paribhuñjissasi, atthiyevihāpi nindāvagamo.
anya-e0801n6:6_5: Vimuye-acchariyaṁ vata bho abbhutaṁ vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena
anya-e0801n6:6_6: viharanti, yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya
anya-e0801n6:6_7: abhikkantāni neva dakkhati na pana saddaṁ sossati, acchariyaṁ andho nāma pabbatamārohissati,
anya-e0801n6:7: 4. Bhūte īuṁ ottha iṁ mhā ā ū se vhaṁ a mhe.
anya-e0801n6:8_0: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ī ādayo honti. Agamī agamuṁ, agamo
anya-e0801n6:8_1: agamittha, agamiṁ agamimhā , agamā agamū, agamise agamivhaṁ, agama agamimhe. Bhūtasāmaññavacanicchāyamanajjatanepi
anya-e0801n6:9: 5. Anajjatane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṁ se vhaṁ iṁ mhase.
anya-e0801n6:10: Avijjamānajjatane bhūte-tthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti.
anya-e0801n6:11: Āñāyyā ca uṭṭhānā, āñāyyā ca saṁvesanā;
anya-e0801n6:13: Agamā agamū, agamo, agamattha, agama agamamhā, agamattha agamatthuṁ, agamase agamavhaṁ, agamiṁ agamamhase. Aññapadattho kiṁ? Ajja hiyyo vā agamāsi.
anya-e0801n6:14: 6. Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe.
anya-e0801n6:15_0: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane-tthe vuttamānato kriyātthā a ādayo honti. Jagāma jagamu,
anya-e0801n6:15_1: jagame jagapittha, jagama jagamimha, jagamittha jagamire, jagamittho jagamivho, jagami
anya-e0801n6:15_3: samānā phalenā-numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto, tenuttamavisayepi payogasamavo.
anya-e0801n6:16: 7. Eyyādo vātipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁ su sse ssatha ssaṁ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṁsu sasse ssavhe ssiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0801n6:17_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṁ ssādayo honti vibhāsā. Vidhurappaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato
anya-e0801n6:17_1: vā kriyāyātipatanamanipphatti kriyātipatti, ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyātītānāgatesveva
anya-e0801n6:17_2: honti na vattamāne tatra… kriyātipatyasambhavā, sace paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissā
anya-e0801n6:17_3: arahā abhavissā, dakkhiṇena ce agamissā na sakaṭaṁ pariyā bhavissā, dakkhiṇena ce
anya-e0801n6:17_4: agamissaṁsu, agamisse agamissatha, agamissaṁ agamissāmhā, agamissatha agamissiṁsu,
anya-e0801n6:17_5: agamissase agamissavhe, agamissiṁ agamissāmhase, na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhavissā, vātikiṁ?
anya-e0801n6:17_6: Dakkhiṇe na ce gamissati na sakaṭaṁ pariyā bhavissati.
anya-e0801n6:18: 8. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyavho eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:19_0: Hetubhūtāyaṁ elabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṁ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo vā honti, sace
anya-e0801n6:19_1: saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṁ na nirujjheyyuṁ, dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyya na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhaveyya,
anya-e0801n6:19_2: dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyyuṁ, gaccheyyāsi gaccheyyātha, gaccheyyāmi gaccheyyāma, gacchetha
anya-e0801n6:19_3: gaccheraṁ, gacchetho gaccheyyavho, gaccheyyaṁ gaccheyyāmhe, na sakaṭaṁ pariyyābhaveyya,
anya-e0801n6:19_4: bhavanaṁ gamanaṁ ca hetu, anirujjhanaṁ apariyābhavanaṁ ca phalaṁ, iha kasmā na hoti
anya-e0801n6:19_5: ‘hantīhi palāyati, vassatīti dhāvati, hanissatīti palāyissatī’ti? Iti saddeneva hetuhetumantatāya
anya-e0801n6:19_6: jotitattā, vāti kiṁ? Dakkhiṇena ce gamissati na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhavissati.
anya-e0801n6:21_0: Pañho=sampucchanaṁ sampadhāraṇaṁ nirūpaṇaṁ kāriyānicchayanaṁ patthanā=yācanaṁ iṭṭhāsiṁ
anya-e0801n6:21_1: bhanañca, vidhi=vidhānaṁ niyojanaṁ kriyāsu byāpāraṇā, sā ca duvidhāva sādarānādaravasena…
anya-e0801n6:21_2: visayabhedena bhinnāyapi tadubhayānativattanato, etesu pañhādīsu kriyatthato eyyodayo
anya-e0801n6:21_3: honti, pañhe - kimāyasmā vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya? Udāhu dhammaṁ, gaccheyyaṁ vāhaṁ uposathaṁ
anya-e0801n6:21_4: na vā gaccheyyaṁ, patthanāyaṁ-labheyyā-haṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ labheyyaṁ
anya-e0801n6:21_5: upasampadaṁ, passeyyaṁ taṁ vassasataṁ arogaṁ, vidhimhi-bhavaṁ pattaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ
anya-e0801n6:21_6: puññaṁ kareyya, iha bhavaṁ bhuñjeyya, iha bhavaṁ nisīdeyya, māṇavakaṁ bhavaṁ ajjhāpeyya,
anya-e0801n6:21_7: anuññāpattakālesupi siddhāva… tatthāpi vidhippatītito, anuññāyaṁ-evaṁ kareyyāsi,
anya-e0801n6:21_8: pattakāle-kaṭaṁ kareyyāsi, patto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ saṅgho
anya-e0801n6:21_9: uposathaṁ kareyya, etassa bhagavā kālo etassa sugata kālo yaṁ bhagavā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0801n6:22: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ ssu vho e āmase.
anya-e0801n6:23_0: Pañhādīsvete honti kriyatthato. Gacchatu gacchantu, gacchāhi gacchatha, gacchāmi
anya-e0801n6:23_1: gacchāma, gacchataṁ gacchantaṁ, gacchassu gacchavho, gacche, gacchāmase, pañhe-kinnu
anya-e0801n6:23_2: khalu bho byākaraṇamadhīyassu, patthanāyaṁ-dadāhi me, jīvatu bhavaṁ, vidhimhi-kaṭaṁ
anya-e0801n6:23_3: karotu bhavaṁ, puññaṁ karotu bhavaṁ, iha bhavaṁ bhuñjatu, iha bhavaṁ nisīdatu, uddisatu
anya-e0801n6:23_4: bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhaṁ, pesane-gaccha bhaṇe gāmaṁ, anumatiyaṁ - evaṁ
anya-e0801n6:23_5: karohi, pattakāle-kālo-yaṁ te mahāvīra uppajja mātukucchiyaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:25: Sattiyaṁ ara hatthe ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti. Bhavaṁ khalu rajjaṁ kareyya, bhavaṁ satto araho.
anya-e0801n6:27_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā. Api pabbataṁ sirasā
anya-e0801n6:27_1: bhindeyya, kriyātipattiyantu ssādī-asaniyāpi hato nāpatissā, sambhāvemi saddahāmi
anya-e0801n6:27_2: avakappemi bhuñjeyya bhavaṁ bhuñjissati bhavaṁ abhuñji bhavaṁ, kriyātipattiyantu
anya-e0801n6:29_0: Mā yoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti. Mā su punapi evarūpamakāsi, mā bhavaṁ agamā
anya-e0801n6:29_1: vanaṁ, vātveva? Mā te kāmaguṇe bhamassu cittaṁ, mā tvaṁ karissasi, mā tvaṁ kareyyāsi,
anya-e0801n6:29_3: evaṁ kato kaṭo sve bhavissati, bhāvi kiccamāsīti.
anya-e0801n6:30_0: Lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṁ lunāti, lunassu lunassutvevāyaṁ lunā-tīti tvādīnamevetaṁ majjhimapurisekavacanānamābhikkhaññe
anya-e0801n6:30_1: dvibbavacanaṁ, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘eva mesa turito aññepi niyojentoviya kiriyaṁ karotī’ti,
anya-e0801n6:30_2: evaṁ lunātha lunāthatvevāyaṁ lunāti, lunavho lunavhotvevāyaṁ lunāti, tathā kālantaresupi
anya-e0801n6:30_3: lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṁ aluni, alunā, lulāva, lunissatīti, evaṁ ssumhi ca yojanīyaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:30_4: tathā samuccayepi maṭhamaṭa, vihāramaṭetvevāyamaṭati, maṭhamaṭassu, vihāramaṭassutvevāyamaṭati,
anya-e0801n6:30_5: byāpārabhede tusāmaññavacanasseva byāpakattā anuppayogo bhavati, odanaṁ bhuñja, yāguṁ
anya-e0801n6:32_0: Ekānekesu tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṁ
anya-e0801n6:32_1: paracchakkānaṁ majjhimuttamapaṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṁ kriyatthā, uttamasaddo-yaṁ
anya-e0801n6:32_2: sabhāvato tatiyaduke ruḷho, tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, tvaṁ gacchase, tumhe
anya-e0801n6:32_3: gacchavhe, ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāma, ahaṁ gacche, mayaṁ gacchāmhe, so gacchati,
anya-e0801n6:32_4: te gacchanti, so gacchate, te gacchante, sāmatthiyā laddhattā appayujjamānesupi tumhāmhasesesu
anya-e0801n6:32_5: bhavanti. Gacchasi, gacchatha, gacchase, gacchavhe, gacchāmi, gacchāma, gacche, gacchāmhe,
anya-e0801n6:34: Āādo īādo ssā ādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hoti. Ñakāro-nubandho, agamā, gamā, agamī, gamī, agamissā, gamissā.
anya-e0801n6:36: Brūssa āho hoti aādīsu. Āha, āhu.
anya-e0801n6:38: Aādīsu bhūssa vuka hoti. Kakāro-nubandho, ukāro uccāraṇattho, babhūva.
anya-e0801n6:40: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti, babhūva.
anya-e0801n6:42: Āhādesā parassa ussa aṁsuvā hoti. Ahaṁsu, āhu.
anya-e0801n6:44: Āhā paresaṁ tiantīnaṁ ṭaṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā, āha, āhu, atoyeva ca ñāpakā tiantīsu ca brūssā-ho.
anya-e0801n6:46: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makāro-nubandho, avoca, īādoti kiṁ? Avacā.
anya-e0801n6:48: Advite vattamānassa dāssa daṁ vā hoti mimesu. Dammi demi, damma dema, advitteti kiṁ? Dadādhi dadāma.
anya-e0801n6:50: Karassa saokārassa kuṁ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi kumma, karomi karoma.
anya-e0801n6:52: Karassa saokārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu. Akāsi akari, akaṁsu akariṁsu, akā akarā.
anya-e0801n6:54: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati karissati, akāhā akarissā, hāhati hāyissati, ahāhā ahāyissā.
anya-e0801n6:56_0: Labhādīnaṁ cchaṅa vā hoti ssenasaha. Alacchā alabhissā, lacchati labhissāti, avacchā
anya-e0801n6:56_1: avasissā, vacchati vasissati, acchecchā acchindissā, checchati chindissati, abhecchā
anya-e0801n6:56_2: abhindissā, bhecchati bhindissati, arucchā arodissā, rucchati rodissatī , aññasmimpi
anya-e0801n6:56_3: chidassa vā cchaṅa yogavibhāgā, acchecchuṁ acchantiṁsu, aññesañca gacchaṁ gacchissaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:58_0: Bhujādīnaṁ kkhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Abhokkhā abhuñjissā, bhokkhati bhuñjissati,
anya-e0801n6:58_1: amokkhā amuñcissā, mokkhatimuñcissati, avakkhā avacissā, vakkhati vaccissati, pāvekkhā
anya-e0801n6:58_2: pāvisissā, pavekkhati pavisissati, visassā-ññasmimpi vā kkhaṅa yogavibhāgā pāvekkhi, pāvisi.
anya-e0801n6:60: Āādo īādo a harassa ā hoti vā. Ahā aharā, ahāsi ahari.
anya-e0801n6:62: Āādo īādo a gamissa ā hoti vā. Agā agamā, agā agamī.
anya-e0801n6:64: Ḍaṁsassa gamissa ca chaṅa vā hoti āīādīsu. Aḍañchā aḍaṁsā, aḍañchi aḍaṁsī, agañchā agacchā, agañchi agacchī.
anya-e0801n6:66: Hūssa heādayo honti ssatyādo. Hessati, hehissati, hohissati.
anya-e0801n6:68: Kṇāknāsu kriyatthassa rasso hoti. Kiṇāti, dhunāti.
anya-e0801n6:69: 33. Ā ī ñu mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā.
anya-e0801n6:70: Esaṁ vā rasso hoti. Gama gamā, gami gamī, gamu gamū, gamimha gamimhā, gamissa gamissā, gamissamha gamissamhā.
anya-e0801n6:72: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti. Akkocchi akkosi, abhirucchi abhiruhi.
anya-e0801n6:74_0: Kriyatthā paresaṁ aādīnaṁ īādīnaṁ ssaādīnañca-byañjanassa iña hoti vibhāsā. Babhuvittha,
anya-e0801n6:74_1: abhavitthā, anubhavissā, anubhavissati anubhossati harisati hassati, etesanti kiṁ?
anya-e0801n6:76: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Bravīti, brūti.
anya-e0801n6:78: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa īña vā hoti. Pacīyati, paccati.
anya-e0801n6:79: 38. Eyyātha sse a ā īthānaṁ o, a, aṁ, ttha, ttho, vhoka.
anya-e0801n6:80_0: Eyyāthādīnaṁ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṁ. Tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha, tvaṁ abhavissa
anya-e0801n6:80_1: abhavisse, ahaṁ abhavaṁ abhava, so abhavittha abhavā, so abhavittho, abhavī, tumhe
anya-e0801n6:80_2: bhavathavho bhavatha, āsahacaritova akāro gayhate, tho pana-nte niddesā tvādisambandhīyeva,
anya-e0801n6:80_3: tasseva vā nissitattā, nissayakaraṇampi hi suttakārāciṇṇaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:82: Umīccassa iṁsu aṁsu vā honti. Agamiṁsu, agamaṁsu, agamuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:84: Eādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṁ vā hoti. Nesuṁ, nayiṁsu, assosuṁ, assuṁ, ādesattākhyāpanatthaṁttaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:86: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṁ vā hoti. Ahesuṁ, ahavuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:88: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Tvaṁ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho abhavo.
anya-e0801n6:90: Ossa si vā hoti. Ahosi tvaṁ ahuvo.
anya-e0801n6:92: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi akā, adāsi adā.
anya-e0801n6:94: Mhātthānamhaña vā hoti. Agamhamhā agamimhā, agamuttha agamittha.
anya-e0801n6:96: Imiccassa siña vā toti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ. Akāsiṁ akariṁ, akāsimhā akarimhā akāsittha akarittha.
anya-e0801n6:98: Eyyumiccassa ñaṁ vā hoti. Gacchuṁ gaccheyyuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:100: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti. Gaccha gacchāhi, atoti kiṁ? Karohi.
anya-e0801n6:102: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Anvabhavissā anvabhūyissā, anubhavissati anuchūyissati.
anya-e0801n6:103: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṁ sa su sa satha saṁ sāma.
anya-e0801n6:104: Asa=bhuviccasmā paresaṁ eyyādicchannaṁ sādayo honti yathākkamaṁ. Assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṁ, assāma.
anya-e0801n6:106: Atthiteyyādicchannaṁ ādibhūtānaṁ dvinnaṁ iyā iyuṁ honti yathākkamaṁ. Siyā, siyuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:108: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti. Atthi, atthu.
anya-e0801n6:110: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu, ṭo sabbādesattho. Asi ahi.
anya-e0801n6:112: Atthismā paresaṁ mimānaṁ mhimhā vā honti, taṁsanniyogenaatthissa aṭa ca. Amhi asmi, amha asma.
anya-e0801n6:114: Esu mimesu atthissa sakāro hoti. Asmi asma, pararūpabādhanatthaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:116: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi. Āsi, āsuṁ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṁ, āsiṁ mhā.
anya-e0801n6:118: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Pacāhi, pacāmi, pacāma, muyhāmi.
anya-e0801n6:122: Sakasmā kṇassakho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissā sakkuṇissā, sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
anya-e0801n6:124: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṁ kṇokṇānaṁ roṭa vā hoti. Assosi asuṇi, assossā asuṇissā, sossati suṇissati.
anya-e0801n6:125: 61. Ñāssa sanāssa nāyo timhi. Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, jānāti.
anya-e0801n6:127: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṁ (vā) hoti. Jaññā (jāneyya).
anya-e0801n6:129: Ñāto eyyāssa iyāñā honti vā. Jāniyā, jaññā jāneyya.
anya-e0801n6:131: Īādo ssatyādo ca ñāto knālopo vā hoti. Aññāsi ajāni, ñassati jānissati.
anya-e0801n6:133: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme. Paññāyihiti paññāyissati.
anya-e0801n6:135: Etismā parassa ssassa hi hoti vā. Ehiti essati.
anya-e0801n6:137: Hanā ssassa chakhā vā honti. Hañchāmi hanissāmi, paṭihaṅkhāmi paṭihanissāmi.
anya-e0801n6:139: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā. Hāhati jahissati.
anya-e0801n6:141: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati, sakkhati sakkhissati, hehiti hehissatihohiti hohissati.
anya-e0801n6:143: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṁ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṁ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kahirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0801n6:145: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0801n6:147: Kayirā parassa ethassa ā hoti. Kayirātha.
anya-e0801n6:148: 73. Labhā iṁ īnaṁ thaṁ thā vā.
anya-e0801n6:149: Labhasmā iṁīiccesaṁ thaṁthā honti vā. Alatthaṁ alabhiṁ, alattha alabhi.
anya-e0801n6:151: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṁ ntentīnaṁ re vā hoti. Gacchare gacchanti, gacchare gacchante, gamissare gamissanti, gamissare gamissante, gurupubbāti kiṁ? Paca, rassati kiṁ? Honti.
anya-e0801n6:153: Eyyādīnaṁ ṭe vā hoti. So kare kareyya, tvaṁ kare kareyyāsi, ahaṁ kare kareyyaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:155: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakke visaye. Tanute.
anya-e0801n6:157: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke. Vanuti vanoti.
anya-e0801n6:159: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti u ca. Bhavemha, bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
